summary: Implements core graph neural network components for processing molecular graphs, including generic graph convolution layers based on GCN and GIN formulations, a node-level encoder, and an enhanced encoder that incorporates a virtual node to propagate global information across the graph.
business_intent: Provide reusable building blocks for training deep learning models that predict quantum chemistry properties of molecules in the OGB PCQM4M benchmark, facilitating scalable graph-based regression tasks.
